Text:
RAR over complicated?  How lazy are you? Next you will want the uploader to come and jack you off while you watch it.   

as long as there is no password protection it can be .RAR .ACE. ZIP .ISO .NRG .OGG .WTF.
get Dziobas Rar Player if its really that "complicated for you"

Rar files complicated??? Jeeeezz!!
Right-click 1st rar file, select 'extract here' or 'extract to folder...' from the list and click it!!
Hey presto - one unrar'd file!!
How f*&kin complicated is THAT???????

@yoiks: you need a brain transplant mate or LEARN how to use your computer!!
